title: Video - Hitler Subtitler gets a cheap font CD
content:
sorry if this has already been seen here.

and warning, strong language.

but it’s still funny.
author: Simon Robertson

comments.content: ok, so the vid did not embed... here is the link: [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qDiDATbIG-o](http://web.archive.org/web/20090805014343/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=qDiDATbIG-o "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qDiDATbIG-o")
I don’t usually say this, but...I have to agree with Hitler.

hehehehe Hitler’s garbage like the subtitle fonts.

Guerrizmo+Design  
No man is an island unto himself\_John Donne
Sooo good. Poor Adolf! Betrayed again, by a Typophile Traitor, no less.

Off-topic, but this version keeps surfacing on car forums around the I-net:

[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iaB40TLQE8M](http://web.archive.org/web/20090805014343/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=iaB40TLQE8M "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iaB40TLQE8M")

Yup, Hitler had an identical breakdown when the Buffalo Bills picked up wide receiver Terrell Owens, etc. etc. [This may be the best one!](http://web.archive.org/web/20090805014343/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=7vMUvgce_5s)
Simon, I nearly busted a gut laughing at that. Extremely funny. Thanks for sharing it!

Wait, you guys haven’t seen the Comic Sans one?  
 [Hitler freaks out over Comic Sans MS](http://web.archive.org/web/20090805014343/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=KzmrxKhaKRU)
Did I mention that I in fact was editing the same dang movie yesterday? And that I was adding subtitles to said movie?
@dan - that comic sans one is great!
“There is tons of great fonts out there and you chose the worst!”
